sentences.text: We invite you to attend the annual meeting of DTE Energy Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. Elect twelve directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. Ratify the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP by the Audit Committee of the Board of Directors as our independent registered public accounting firm for the year 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. Provide an advisory vote to approve executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. Vote on a shareholder proposal to publish an assessment of long-term impacts on the Companys portfolio of public policies and technological advances consistent with limiting global warming to no more than two degrees Celsius over pre-industrial levels; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. Consider any other business that may properly come before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only shareholders of record at the close of business on March 7, 2017, the record date for this meeting, or their representatives authorized by proxy may attend or vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This 2017 Notice of Annual Meeting, as well as the accompanying Proxy Statement and proxy card, will be first sent or given to our shareholders on or about March 20, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This year, beginning on or about March 20, 2017, we have conserved resources and reduced costs by mailing a meeting notice to many of our registered and beneficial shareholders containing instructions on how to access our Proxy Statement and Annual Report on Form 10-K and vote online or how to request a paper copy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders who receive that meeting notice will not receive a paper copy of the Proxy Statement and Annual Report on Form 10-K or a proxy card unless they request one.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Every vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote your shares (1) by telephone, (2) via the Internet, (3) if you received a paper copy, by completing and mailing the enclosed proxy card in the return envelope or (4) in person at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specific nstructions for voting by telephone or via the Internet are attached to the proxy card or to the meeting notice that you received if you did not receive a paper copy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you attend the meeting and vote at it, your vote at the meeting will replace any earlier vote by telephone, Internet or proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to attend the annual meeting in person, you must register in advance.

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT SUMMARY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DTE Energy Aspiration and System of Priorities
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At DTE Energy Company (DTE Energy, the Company, we, us or our), we aspire to be the best-operated energy company in North America and a force for growth and prosperity in the communities where we live and serve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This aspiration drives everything we do and has led us to develop a system of corporate priorities that guide our daily, monthly and annual plans which help us to achieve this aspiration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors (the Board) evaluates our Companys and executives performance based upon goals that align with this system of priorities and we will refer to this system of priorities as we discuss DTE Energys performance and our compensation programs throughout this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Becoming the best-operated energy company means having great corporate governance, competitive compensation and excellent shareholder relations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder Engagement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have continued our shareholder engagement activities this year and, as a result of those discussions, weve learned a lot about what is important to our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder engagement is a year-round process for us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Every spring we reach out to large shareholders to discuss issues related to proxy season and the proposals to be presented at our annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the fall, we conduct another round of conversations to discuss general governance issues and trends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Company held discussions with shareholders who collectively own or exercise voting control over 36.6% of the Companys outstanding shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This engagement has helped the Companys management and Board identify governance and compensation policies and practices that are most important to our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Company routinely contacts shareholders who have submitted proposals for inclusion in our annual proxy statement, in an effort to understand their concerns and to address, where possible, the issues behind their proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will continue to look for opportunities to provide more information about the Companys approach on topics of interest to shareholders, and to stimulate more conversations with shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Governance Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is committed to creating long-term value for our shareholders while operating in an ethical, legal, environmentally sensitive and socially responsible manner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board follows sound governance practices, some of whic are highlighted below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For more detail, see the Corporate Governance section of this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eleven of twelve director nominees, 92%, are independent; our Chairman & Chief Executive Officer ("CEO") is the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Board committees are composed exclusively of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have implemented a proxy access provision, which makes it possible for a group of shareholders meeting certain criteria to nominate and include in the Companys proxy materials a candidate for the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have a Lead Independent Director, elected by the independent members of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Independent Director maintains final approval authority over Board agendas, meeting materials and schedules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Independent Director is also available for consultation and direct communication with large shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our directors are elected annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board and its committees conduct annual self-assessments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, each independent director who has served for one year or more undergoes an annual peer review.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive officers and directors are all subject to robust stock ownership requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: including experience, gender, race, ethnicity and age when evaluating nominees for the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We limit our directors who are CEOs of public companies to a total of not more than three public company boards and all other directors to a total of not more than four public company boards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: n June 2016, the Board amended
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the Board Mission and Guidelines and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the Officer Code of Business Conduct and Ethics to prohibit our directors and officers from pledging their shares of Company stock as collateral for any loan or ndebtedness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This prohibition includes, but is not limited to, holding such shares in a margin account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company continued to deliver on its objectives to provide strong earnings per share and dividend growth in 2016, while maintaining a strong balance sheet, employee engagement, and improving customer service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Some highlights of the Companys 2016 performance include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Achieved 7.6% compound operating earnings per share growth from 2012-2016 (see discussion of operating earnings on page 44).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Increased our dividend payment to an annualized rate of $3.08 per share in 2016, representing a 5.5% increase over the annualized dividend rate in 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Achieved outstanding safety results including finishing in the top decile of companies completing the National Safety Council barometer survey and earning the lowest OSHA injury recordable rate in Company history for the second straight year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Achieved top quartile customer satisfaction for both electric and gas residential customers in latest J.D. Power studies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Received Gallup Great Workplace Award for the fourth consecutive year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation programs are designed to be competitive with our peers, have a meaningful performance component linked to the achievement of short-term and long-term goals that align with our shareholders long-term interests and encourage executives to have an ownership interest in the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Chairman and CEOs total compensation shows strong pay-for-performance alignment with growth in long-term shareholder value creation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our CEOs compensation growth trend is consistent with the growth in value of a $100 investment in DTE Energy Company stock made at the beginning of 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CEO Total Compensation $000s 12,604 10,174 12,499 Total Shareholder Return (Indexed, Base Period 2011=100) 177.70 171.00 217.04
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys compensation programs are also designed to clearly align performance objectives for our named executive officers with the interests of shareholders and with managements system of priorities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our performance measures are designed to help move our Company towards achieving these priorities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For more details, see our prioritie alignment chart in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis Summary on page 35.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other highlights from our compensation program include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our short-term and long-term performance metrics all tie directly to our system of priorities (see above).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These are the same metrics that management uses to assess the Companys progress toward our aspiration of becoming the best-operated energy company in North America and a force for growth and prosperity in the communities where we live and serve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our equity compensation plan forbids buyouts of underwater stock options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has never bought or repriced underwater stock options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our equity compensation plan requires a minimum twelve month vesting period for equity awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: typical practice is to require a three-year vesting period for equity awards and the Company has never issued equi awards with less than a one-year vesting period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has adopted a clawback policy that provides that, in the event of an accounting restatement due to material noncompliance with federal securities laws, the Company may recover excess performance-based compensation awarded to current or former officers during the three-year period preceding the restatement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive Change-In-Control Severance Agreements do not include excise tax gross-ups
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have eliminated the automatic vesting of equity issued under our Long-Term Incentive Plan upon a change in control of the Company, unless an acquiring or surviving entity fails to replace or affirm the existing equity awards with awards by the surviving company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Items for Shareholder Vote at this Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the 2017 Annual Meeting shareholders will vote on the following proposals:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 1: Elect twelve members of the Board of Directors for one year terms ending in 2018;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 2: Ratify the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our independent auditors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 3: Provide a nonbinding vote to approve the Companys executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 4: Provide a nonbinding vote on the frequency of advisory votes to approve executive compensation; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 5: Vote on a shareholder proposal to publish an assessment of long-term impacts on the companys portfolio of public policies and technological advances consistent with limiting global warming to no more than two degrees Celsius over pre-industrial levels.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders may vote on any other matter that properly comes before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal No.1: Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has nominated twelve directors for election at the 2017 annual shareholder meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are elected to serve annual terms which expire when their successors are elected at the next years annual shareholder meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the nominees are currently directors of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies cannot be voted for more than twelve persons at this meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any nominee becomes unable or unwilling to serve at the time of the meeting, the persons named in the enclosed proxy card have discretionary authority to vote for a substitute nominee or nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is anticipated that all nominees will be available for election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the nominees are incumbent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The biographies of each of the nominees below contain information regarding the persons service as a director, business experience, and director positions held currently or at any time during at least the last five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The age provided for each director is as of March 9, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to the information presented below regarding each persons experience, qualifications, attributes, and skills that caused our Corporate Governance Committee and Board to determine that the person should serve as a director, the Board believes that all of the Companys directors have a reputation for integrity, honesty and adherence to high ethical standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They each have demonstrated business acumen, strategic insight, an ability to exercise sound judgment, and a commitment to service and community involvement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Finally, we value their significant experience on other public company boards of directors and board committees and the diversity that they bring to our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following graphs display information about the skills and experience our Board members bring to their service:

sentences.text: Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Governance Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At DTE Energy, we are committed to operating in an ethical, legal, environmentally sensitive and socially responsible manner, while creating long-term value for our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The foundation of our governance practices begins at the top, with the DTE Energy Board of Directors Mission and Guidelines (Governance Guidelines).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Guidelines set forth the practices the Board follows with respect to Board composition and selection, Board meetings, the performance evaluation and succession planning for DTE Energys Chief Executive Officer (CEO or Chief Executive Officer), Board committees, Board compensation, and communicating with the Board, among other things.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Guidelines are also intended to align the interests of directors and management with those of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following is a summary of the Governance Guidelines, along with other governance practices at DTE Energy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors and Vacancies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has a declassified board of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are elected annually for terms which expire upon election o their successor at the next years annual shareholder meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a vacancy on the Board occurs between annual shareholder meetings, the vacancy may be filled by a majority vote of the directors then in office.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The new directors term will expire upon election of their successor at the next years annual shareholder meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Governance Guidelines, the Corporate Governance Committee periodically assesses the skills, characteristics and composition of the Board, along with the need for expertise and other relevant factors as it deems appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In light of these assessments, and in light of the standards set forth in the Governance Guidelines, the Corporate Governance Committee may seek candidates with specific qualifications and candidates who satisfy other requirements set by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe our Board should be comprised of directors who have had high-level executive experience, have been directors on other boards and have been tested through economic downturns and crises.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Industry experience, regional relationships and broad diversity of experience and backgrounds are also factors in Board nominee selection.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards Governance Guidelines confirm that we believe it is desirable for Board members to possess diverse characteristics of gender, race, ethnicity, and age, and we consider these factors in Board evaluation and in the identification of candidates for Board membership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe this type of composition enables the Board to oversee the management of the business and affairs of the Company effectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information about the skills, experiences and qualifications of our directors is included in their biographies beginning on page 6.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee considers candidates who have been properly nominated by shareholders, as well as candidates who have been identified by Board members and Company personnel.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Corporate Governance Committee may use a search firm to assist in the search for candidates and nominees and to evaluate the nominees skills against the Boards criteria.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on its review of all candidates, the Corporate Governance Committee ecommends a slate of director nominees for election at the annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The slate of nominees may nclude both incumbent and new nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Potential candidates are reviewed and evaluated by the Corporate Governance Committee, and selected candidates go on to be interviewed by one or more Corporate Governance Committee members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An invitation to join the Board is extended by the Board itself, through the Chairman and the Chair of the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our Bylaws, a group of up to 20 shareholders owning 3% or more of the Companys outstanding common stock continuously for at least three (3) years may nominate and include in the Companys proxy materials a candidate for the Board of Directors (a Shareholder Nominee), provided that the shareholder(s) and the nominee satisfy the requirements specified in the Bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The total number of Shareholder Nominees that the Company must include in the Companys proxy materials in a given year shall not exceed 20% of the number of directors in office at the time of the nomination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Composition of the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Governance Guidelines and our Bylaws state that the exact size of the Board will be determined by resolution of the Board from time to time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board currently has twelve members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence and Categorical Standards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a matter of policy and in accordance with New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) listing standards, we believe that the Board should consist of a majority of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board must affirmatively determine that a director has no material relationship with the Company, either directly or indirectly, or as a partner, shareholder or officer of an organization that has a relationship with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has established the following categorical standards for director independence, which are more stringent than the NYSE independence standards for former Company executives:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director for whom any of the following is true will not be considered independent:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director who is currently, or has been at any time in the past, an employee of the Company or a subsidiary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director whose immediate family member is, or has been within the last three years, an executive officer of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director who receives, or whose immediate family member receives, more than $120,000 in direct compensation from the Company during any twelve-month period within the last three years, other than director and committee fees and pension or other forms of deferred compensation for prior service (provided such compensation is not contingent in any way on continued service).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director who is, or whose immediate family member is, a current partner of a firm that is the Companys internal or external auditor; the director is a current employee of such a firm; the immediate family member is a current employee of such a firm and personally works on the Companys audit; or the director or immediate family member was, within the last three years, a partner or employee of such a firm and personally worked on the Companys audit within that time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director who is employed, or whose immediate family member is employed, or has been employed within the last three years, as an executive officer of another company where any of the Companys present executives at the same time serves or served on that companys compensation committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director who is a current employee, or whose immediate family member is a current executive officer, of a company that has made payments to, or received payments from, the Company for property or services in an amount which, in any of the last three fiscal years, exceeds the greater of $1 million or 2% of such other companys consolidated gross revenues is not independent until three years after the company falls below such threshold.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Contributions by the Company to a tax-exempt organization will not be considered to be a material relationship that would impair a directors independence if a director serves as an executive officer of a tax-exempt organization and, within the preceding three years, contributions in any single fiscal year were less than $1 million or 2% (whichever is greater) of such tax-exempt organizations consolidated gross revenues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Applying these standards and considering all relevant facts and circumstances, the Board has affirmatively determined that all of our directors other than Gerard M. Anderson qualify as independent and have no material relationship with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent directors are David A. Brandon, W. Frank Fountain, Jr., Charles G. McClure, Jr., Gail J. McGovern, Mark A. Murray, James B. Nicholson, Charles W. Pryor, Jr., Josue Robles, Jr., Ruth G. Shaw, David A. Thomas and James H. Vandenberghe.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Anderson is not an independent director and may be deemed to be an affiliate of the Company under the categorical standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Anderson is not considered independent due to his current employment as Chairman and Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There were no material relationships that the Board considered when determining the independence of the directors other than Mr. Anderson.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assessment of Board and Committee Performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board evaluates its performance annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, each Board committee performs an annual self-assessment to determine its effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Board member also performs an intensive annual peer review of every other director who has served one year or more.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The results of the Board and committee self-assessments are discussed with the Board and each committee, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The results of the individual peer review are reviewed by the Chair of the Corporate Governance Committee and discussed with the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chair of the Corporate Governance Committee discusses the results of the peer review with individual directors, as directed by the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Terms of Office
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has not established term limits for directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We assure the independence and ongoing effectiveness of each independent director through the individualized peer assessment process described above, in which each Board member annually undergoes a rigorous evaluation by the other members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Corporate Governance Committee of the Board has established policies that independent directors should not stand for election after attaining the age of 75, unless the Board waives this provision when circumstances exist which make it prudent to continue the service of the particular independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors who are retired CEOs of the Company or its subsidiaries shall not stand for election after attaining the age of 70.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except for the CEO, who may continue to serve as a director after retirement for so long as he is serving as Chairman, any other employees who are also directors will not stand for re-election after retiring from employment with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of the Chairman and the CEO; Lead Independent Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Bylaws currently provide that the Chairman may simultaneously serve as the CEO of the Company and shall preside at all meetings of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Bylaws also provide that the independent members of the Board may elect an independent director as Lead Independent Director, which has been our practice since 2004.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes it is in the best interests of the Company and shareholders for the Board to have flexibility in determining whether to separate or combine the roles of Chairman and Chief Executive Officer based on the Companys circumstances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has strong governance structures and processes in place to ensure the independence of the Board, eliminate conflicts of interest and prevent dominance of the Board by senior management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Guidelines and various committee charters provide for independent discussion among directors and for independent evaluation of, and communication with, many members of senior management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board members have considerable experience and knowledge regarding the challenges and opportunities facing the Company and shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes, therefore, that separating the roles of Chairman and Chief Executive Officer is unnecessary at this time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that Mr. Anderson is well qualified through his experience and expertise to be the person who generally sets the agenda for (subject to the approval of the Lead Independent Director) and leads Board discussions of strategic issues for the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nevertheless, the Board will separate these functions when it considers the separation to be in the best interests of the Company and shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With both the Chairman and CEO positions held by Mr. Anderson, the Board continues to believe a good governance practice is to elect a Lead Independent Director from the independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Independent Director will have such responsibilities as required under the NYSE listing standards, as well as such other responsibilities as determined by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Independent Director serves in that capacity until replaced.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There is no defined term of office, and the assignment does not rotate among the directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On September 18, 2014, the Board unanimously elected James B. Nicholson to serve as Lead Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Independent Directors duties include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Calling regularly scheduled executive sessions; presiding at Board executive sessions of non-management directors or independent directors; and providing feedback regarding such sessions, as appropriate, to the Chairman and the CEO;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Serving as the liaison between the Chairman and CEO and the independent directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approving the general scope and type of information to be presented at Board meetings;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviewing shareholder communications addressed to the Board or to the Lead Independent Director;  Making himself or herself available if requested by major shareholders, for direct consultation and communication with shareholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Organizing Board meetings in the absence of the Chairman; presiding at any session of the Board where the Chairman is not present;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Designating one or more directors as alternate members of any committee to replace an absent or disqualified member at any committee meeting, provided that, in the event an alternate member is designated for the Audit, Corporate Governance or Organization and Compensation Committee, the designate meets the Companys categorical standards for director independence and SEC and NYSE requirements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Retaining independent advisors in consultation with the Board, on behalf of the Board as the Board determines to be necessary or appropriate;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participating in the Organization and Compensation Committees annual review and approval of the CEOs corporate goals and objectives and evaluation of the CEOs performance;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approving Board meeting agendas after consulting with the Chairman and CEO and the Corporate Secretary; and  Collaborating with the Chairman and CEO and the Corporate Secretary on scheduling Board and committee meetings and approving the schedule of Board and Committee meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Meetings and Attendance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board met eight times in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the incumbent directors attended at least 83% of the Board meetings and the meetings of the committees on which they served, eight of whom had a 100% attendance record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board does not have a policy with regard to directors attendance at the annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All twelve directors then in office attended last years annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Sessions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is the Boards practice that the independent directors meet in executive session at most regular Board meetings and meet in executive session at other times whenever they believe it appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent directors met in executive sessions (sessions without the Chairman and CEO or any representatives of management present) at five of the eight Board meetings in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent directors meet in executive session on an annual basis to review the Organization and Compensation Committees performance review of the CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Independent Director chairs the executive sessions of the independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Codes of Business Conduct and Ethics
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The DTE Energy Board of Directors Code of Business Conduct and Ethics, the Officer Code of Business Conduct and Ethics and the DTE Energy Way are the standards of behavior for Company directors, officers, and employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any waiver of, or amendments to, the Board of Directors Code of Business Conduct and Ethics and the Officer Code of Business Conduct and Ethics as it pertains to the CEO, the Chief Financial Officer, senior financial officers and other Executive Officers, as defined in the Security Ownership of Directors and Officers section on page 25, will be disclosed promptly by posting such waivers or amendments on the Company website, dteenergy.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There were no waivers or amendments during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Communications with the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has established several methods for shareholders or other non-affiliated persons to communicate their concerns to the directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Concerns regarding auditing, accounting practices, internal controls, or other business ethics issues may be submitted to the Audit Committee through its reporting channel:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By telephone: By Internet: By mail: 877-406-9448 ethicsinaction.dteenergy.com For auditing, accounting, or internal control matters: For business ethics issues:     DTE Energy Company DTE Energy Company     Audit Committee Ethics and Employee Issues     One Energy Plaza One Energy Plaza     Room 2431 WCB Room 2188 WCB     Detroit, Michigan 48226-1279 Detroit, Michigan 48226-127
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any other concern may be submitted to the Corporate Secretary by mail for prompt delivery to the Lead Independent Director at:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lead Independent Director c/o Corporate Secretary DTE Energy Company One Energy Plaza Room 2386 WCB Detroit, Michigan 48226-1279
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Periodically, we revise our governance information in response to changing regulatory requirements and evolving corporate governance developments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Current copies of the Governance Guidelines, committee charters, categorical standards of director independence and the codes of ethics referred to above are available on our website at dteenergy.com/governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can also request a copy of any or all of these documents and a copy of the Companys Annual Report on Form 10-K, free of charge, by mailing your request to the Corporate Secretary, DTE Energy Company, One Energy Plaza, Room 2386 WCB, Detroit, Michigan 48226-1279.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The information on the Companys website is not, and shall not be deemed to be, a part of this Proxy Statement or incorporated into any other filings the Company makes with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committees of the Board of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has standing committees for Audit, Corporate Governance, Finance, Nuclear Review, Organization and Compensation, and Public Policy and Responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board committees act in an advisory capacity to the full Board, except that the Organization and Compensation Committee has direct responsibility for the CEOs goals, performance and compensation along with compensation of other executives, and the Audit Committee has direct responsibility for appointing, replacing, compensating and overseeing the independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each committee has adopted a charter that clearly establishes the committees respective roles and responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, each committee has authority to retain independent outside professional advisors or experts as it deems advisable or necessary, including the sole authority to retain and terminate any such advisors, to carry out its duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that each member of the Audit, Corporate Governance, and Organization and Compensation Committees is independent under our categorical standards and that each member is free of any relationship that would interfere with his
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: or her individual exercise of independent judgment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that each member of the Audit Committee meets the independence requirements under the SEC rules and NYSE listing standards applicable to audit committee members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has also determined that each member of the Organization and Compensation Committee meets the independence requirements under the SEC rules and NYSE listing standards applicable to compensation committee members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following is a summary of the terms of each committees charter and the responsibilities of its members:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee (Six meetings in 2016)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assists the Board in its oversight of the quality and integrity of our accounting, auditing and financial reporting practices and the independence of the independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews financial reports, internal controls and financial and accounting risk exposures.

sentences.text: The Board has reviewed the qualifications and experience of each of the Audit Committee members and determined that Gen. Robles and Messrs. Fountain and Vandenberghe qualify as audit committee financial experts as that term has been defined by the SEC.

sentences.text: Board of Directors Risk Oversight Functions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board receives, reviews and assesses reports from the Board committees and from management relating to enterprise-level risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Board committee is responsible for overseeing and considering risk issues relating to their respective committee and reporting their assessments to the full Board at each regularly scheduled Board meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When granting authority to management, approving strategies and receiving management reports, the Board and committees consider, among other things, the risks we face.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Board committee reviews managements assessment of risk for that committees respective area of responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of its oversight function, the Board discusses any risk conflicts that may arise between the committees or assigns to a committee risk issues that may arise which do not fall within a specific committees responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Committee   Areas of Risk Oversight Audit Committee   Overall review of risk issues, policies and controls associated with our overall financial reporting and disclosure process and legal compliance, and review policies on risk control assessment and accounting risk exposure Finance Committee   Review of financial, capital, credit and insurance risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Organization and Compensation Committee   Assess and discuss with the Board the relationship between the inherent risks in executive compensation plans, executive compensation arrangements and executive performance goals and payouts, and how the level of risk corresponds to the Companys business strategies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Committee   Review risks associated with the Companys governance practices and the interaction of the Companys governance with enterprise risk-level management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nuclear Review Committee   Review risks relating to the operation of our nuclear power facilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Public Policy and Responsibility Committee   Review risks associated with regulatory, social responsibility, political activity, economic conditions, reputation, safety and the environment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Board committees meet periodically with members of senior management to discuss the relevant risks and challenges facing the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to its regularly scheduled Committee meetings, the Audit Committee meets with the Chief Financial Officer, the General Auditor and Chief Risk Officer and the independent registered public accounting firm in executive sessions at least semi-annually, and meets with the General Counsel and the Chief Compliance Officer at least annually in separate executive sessions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys General Auditor and Chief Risk Officer attends all Audit Committee meetings and meets annually with either the Audit Committee or the full Board to update the members on the Companys enterprise-level risk management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The General Auditor and Chief Risk Officer also periodically meets with the other Board committees and the full Board as may be required.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company also utilizes an internal Risk Management Committee, chaired by the Chairman and CEO and comprised of the Chief Operating Officer, Chief Financial Officer, Chief Administrative Officer, General Counsel, Treasurer, General Auditor and Chief Risk Officer and other senior officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among other things, the internal Risk Management Committee directs the development and maintenance of comprehensive risk management policies and procedures, and sets, reviews and monitors risk limits on a regular basis for enterprise-level risks, counter-party credit and commodity-based exposures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that the committee structure of risk oversight is in the best interests of the Company and its shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each committee member has expertise on risks relative to the nature of the committee on which he or she sits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With each committee reporting on risk issues at full Board meetings, the entire Board is in a position to assess the overall risk implications, to evaluate how they may affect the Company and to provide oversight on appropriate actions for management to take.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With regard to risk and compensation programs and policies, the Companys Energy Trading segment has compensation programs and policies that are structured differently from those in other units within the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These compensation programs and policies are designed to discourage excessive risk taking by the Energy Trading employees and are subject to specific written policies and procedures administered by members of the Companys senior management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Company has determined that the Energy Trading compensation programs and policies do not create risks that are reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Elements of Director Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employee directors receive no payment for service as directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The goal of our compensation policies for non-employee directors is to tie their compensation to your interests as shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, approximately 50% of a directors annual compensation is in the form of equity-based compensation, including phantom shares of our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally, the compensation program for non-employee directors is reviewed on an annual basis by the Corporate Governance Committee and the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This review includes a review of a comparative peer group of companies that is identical to the peer group used to review executive compensation (See Executive CompensationCompensation Discussion and Analysis beginning on page 34).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the review completed in December 2016, the Board voted to increase director compensation effective January 1, 2017, as further described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, Board and Committee meeting fees are being eliminated to align with current market practice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cash Compensation     Cash retainer   $120,000 annually Lead Independent Director retainer   $25,000 annually Committee chair retainer   $20,000 annually for Audit Committee Chair; $15,000 annually for Corporate Governance, Finance, Nuclear Review, Organization and Compensation, and Public Policy and Responsibility Committee Chairs New Member Orientation/Mentor Program   $1,250 and $750 quarterly for the New Member and Mentor, respectively, for the duration of the orientation Equity Compensation     Upon first election to the Board   1,000 shares of restricted DTE Energy common stock Annual equity compensation   A variable number of phantom shares of DTE Energy common stock valued at $130,000 annually, with the actual number of phantom shares to be granted each year determined based on the closing price of the Companys common stock on the first business day of each calendar year(1)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1)    Phantom shares of DTE Energy common stock are credited to each non-employee directors account in January of each year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Phantom share accounts are also credited with dividend equivalents which are reinvested into additional phantom shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For phantom shares granted after 2004, payment of the cash value is made three years after the date of grant unless otherwise deferred by voluntary election of the director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For phantom shares granted before 2005, payment of the cash value occurs only after the date a director terminates his or her service on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment of Non-Employee Director Fees and Expenses
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Retainers for non-employee directors are either
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) payable in cash or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) at the election of the director, deferred into an account pursuant to the DTE Energy Company Plan for Deferring the Payment of Directors Fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-employee directors may defer up to 100% of their annual retainer into an unfunded deferred compensation plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred fees may accrue for uture payment, with interest accrued monthly at the 5-year U.S. Treasury Bond rate as of the last business day of each month or, at the election of the director, they may be invested in phantom shares of our common stock with all dividend equivalents reinvested.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to the retainers, non-employee directors are reimbursed for their travel expenses incurred in attending Board and committee meetings, along with reimbursement for fees and expenses incurred when attending director education seminars or special meetings requested by management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-employee directors of the Company, along with full-time active employees and retirees, are also eligible to participate in the DTE Energy matching gift program, whereby the DTE Energy Foundation matches certain charitable contributions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Life Insurance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company provides each non-employee director with group term life insurance in the amount of $20,000 and travel accident insurance in the amount of $100,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Stock Ownership
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have established stock ownership guidelines for non-employee directors to more closely tie their interests to those of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under these guidelines, the Board requires that each director own shares of the Companys common stock beginning no later than 30 days after election to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, directors are required to own, within five years after initial election to the Board, shares of Company stock having a value equal to two times the sum of a directors annual cash retainer plus the value of a directors annual phantom stock compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the 2017 director compensation program, a director with five years of service will be required to hold a minimum of $500,000 in stock under these guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This ownership requirement is greater than four times the amount of a directors cash retainer under the 2017 compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Common stock, time-based restricted stock, and phantom shares held by a director are counted toward fulfillment of this ownership requirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of December 31, 2016, all directors met the initial common stock ownership requirement and all those directors who have served as a director for at least five years after their initial election have fulfilled the five-year requirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Indemnification and Liability
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to Article VI of our Articles of Incorporation, to the fullest extent permitted by law, no director of the Company shall be personally liable to the Company or its shareholders in the performance of his/her duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article VII of our Articles of Incorporation provides that each person who is or was or had agreed to become a director or officer, or each person who is or was serving or who had agreed to serve at the request of the Board as an employee or agent of the Company, or as a director, officer, employee or agent of another corporation, partnership, joint venture, trust or other enterprise (including heirs, executors, administrators or estate of such person), shall be indemnified by the Company to the fullest extent permitted by law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have entered into indemnification agreements with each of our directors and executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These agreements require the Company to indemnify such individuals for certain liabilities to which they may become subject as a result of their affiliation with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company, the directors and officers in their capacities as such are insured against liability for alleged wrongful acts (to the extent defined) under twelve insurance policies providing aggregate coverage in the amount of $245 million.

sentences.text: Prohibition on Pledging and Hedging Company Securities
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company maintains policies which expressly prohibit hedging Company securities by all employees, executive officers and directors of the Company and its subsidiaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of these policies, hedging includes purchases and sales of derivatives based upon Company securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our directors and officers are also prohibited from pledging their shares of Company stock as collateral for any loan or indebtedness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This prohibition includes, but is not limited to, holding such shares in a margin account.

sentences.text: Certain Relationships and Related Transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Related-person transactions have the potential to create actual or perceived conflicts of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has policies in place to address related-party transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our Corporate Governance Committee and Audit Committee review potential dealings or transactions with related parties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In conducting such reviews, the committees consider various factors they deem appropriate, which may include
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the identity of the related party and his or her relationship to the Company,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the nature and size of the transaction, including whether it involved the provision of goods or services to the Company that are unavailable from unrelated third parties and whether the transaction is on terms that are comparable to the terms available from unrelated third parties,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the nature and size of the related partys interest in the transaction,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) the benefits to the Company of the transaction and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) whether the transaction could involve an apparent or actual conflict of interest with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In general, employees and directors may not be involved in a business transaction where there is a conflict of interest with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The DTE Energy Way requires non-officer employees to report conflicts of interest or potential conflicts of interest to their respective superiors; the Officer Code of Conduct and Ethics requires officers to report conflicts of interest or potential conflicts of interest to the Companys General Counsel or to the Companys Board of Directors; and the Board of Directors Code of Business Conduct and Ethics requires directors to disclose conflicts of interest or potential conflicts of interest to the Companys Corporate Governance Committee or the Chairman of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For directors and officers, any waivers of the Companys conflict of interest policy must be approved by the Board or a Board committee, as required under the Officer Code of Conduct and Ethics or Board of Directors Code of Business Conduct and Ethics, disclosed to shareholders and posted to our website at dteenergy.com/ethics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following the Audit Committees appointment, the Board voted unanimously to recommend that our shareholders vote to ratify the Audit Committees selection of PwC as our ndependent auditors for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The reports of PwC on the consolidated financial statements of DTE Energy for the year ended December 31, 2016 and for the year ended December 31, 2015 did not contain adverse opinions or a disclaimer of opinions and were not qualified or modified as to uncertainty, audit scope or accounting principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the Companys two most recent fiscal years, ended December 31, 2016 and 2015, and from January 1, 2017 through February 9, 2017, there were no disagreements with PwC on any matter of accounting principles or practices, financial statement disclosure or auditing scope or procedure, which disagreements, if not resolved to PwCs satisfaction, would have caused PwC to make reference to the subject matter of such disagreements in connection with its reports on the Companys consolidated financial statements for such years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the Companys two most recent fiscal years, ended December 31, 2016 and 2015 and from January 1, 2017 through February 9, 2017, there were no reportable events as defined under Item 304(a)(1)(v) of Regulation S-K.

sentences.text: Policy on Audit Committee Pre-Approval of Audit and Permissible Non-Audit Services of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with SEC policies regarding the independence of the registered public accounting firm, the Audit Committee is responsible for appointing, approving professional service fees of, and overseeing the work of the independent registered
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has established a policy regarding pre-approval of all audit and permissible non-audit services provided by the independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to engaging the independent registered public accounting firm to perform specific services, the Audit Committee pre- approves these services by category of service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee may delegate to the Chair of the Audit Committee, or to one or more other designated members of the Audit Committee, the authority to grant pre-approvals of all permitted services or classes of these permitted services to be provided by the independent registered public accounting firm up to, but not exceeding, a pre-defined limit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The decisions of the designated member to pre-approve a permitted service are reported to the Audit Committee at each scheduled meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At least quarterly, the Audit Committee reviews:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A report summarizing the services, or groupings of related services, including fees, provided by the independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A listing of new services requiring pre-approval, if any.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As appropriate, an updated projection for the current fiscal year, presented in a manner consistent with the proxy disclosure requirements, of the estimated annual fees to be paid to the independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All audit, audit-related, tax and other services performed by PwC were pre-approved by the Audit Committee in accordance with the regulations of the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee considered and determined that the provision of the non-audit services by PwC during 2016 was compatible with maintaining independence of the registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Report of the Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of the Audit Committee is to assist the Boards oversight of the integrity of the Companys consolidated financial statements, the Companys compliance with legal and regulatory requirements, the Companys independent registered public accounting firms qualifications and independence and the performance of the Companys internal audit function.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All members of the Audit Committee meet the criteria for independence as defined in our categorical standards and the audit committee independence requirements under the SEC rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee Charter also complies with requirements of the NYSE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for the financial reporting process, including the system of internal controls, and for the preparation of consolidated financial statements in accordance with accounting principles generally accepted in the United States of America (GAAP).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is also responsible for maintaining effective internal control over financial reporting and for its assessment of the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent registered public accounting firm is responsible for auditing these consolidated financial statements and expressing an opinion as to their conformity with GAAP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent registered public accounting firm is also responsible for expressing an opinion on the effectiveness of the Companys internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committees responsibility is to monitor and review these processes, acting in an oversight capacity, and the Audit Committee does not certify the consolidated financial statements or internal control over financial reporting or guarantee the independent registered public accounting firms reports.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee relies, without independent verification, on the information provided to it including representations made by management and the reports of the independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee discussed with PwC the matters required to be discussed by audit standards, SEC regulations and NYSE requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Disclosures were received from PwC regarding its independence as required by applicable requirements of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board and discussed with them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has considered whether the services provided by PwC other than those services relating to audit services are compatible with maintaining PwCs independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has concluded that such services have not impaired PwCs independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviewed and discussed the audited consolidated financial statements for the year ended December 31, 2016 with management and PwC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the review and discussions noted above, the Audit Committee recommended to the Board that the audited consolidated financial statements be included in the Companys Annual Report on Form 10-K filed with the SEC for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviewed and discussed Managements Report on Internal Control over Financial Reporting as of December 31, 2016 with management and PwC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the review and discussions noted above, the Audit Committee recommended to the Board that Managements Report on Internal Control over Financial Reporting as of December 31, 2016 be included in the Companys Annual Report on Form 10-K filed with the SEC for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016.

sentences.text: Proposal No. 3  Advisory Proposal  Nonbinding Vote to Approve Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act of 2010 (the Dodd-Frank Act) requires the Company o provide shareholders with an opportunity to vote to approve, on an advisory basis, the compensation of our Named Executive Officers as described in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis (CD&A) section of this proxy statement and in the tabular and narrative disclosure regarding Named Executive Officer compensation, all contained under the heading Executive Compensation in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys executive compensation program is designed to include elements of cash and equity-based compensation to motivate and reward executives who achieve short-term and long-term corporate and financial objectives eading to the success of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We emphasize competitive, performance-based compensation to attract and retain talented executives and align the interests of our executives with those of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At each of the 2016 and 2015 annual meetings, 96.2% and 87.3%, respectively, of voting shareholders approved the compensation of the Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders have in the past approved the incentive plans that we use to motivate and reward our executives, including the Annual Incentive Plan, the Long-Term Incentive Plan and the Executive Performance Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Company has enhanced our disclosures related to executive compensation to provide more detail to our shareholders about our compensation programs, including expanded disclosures relating to these plans in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation programs have been important in driving the Companys success in achieving its corporate and financial objectives by tying executive compensation to achieving very specific goals in each of our key priority areas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Progress against these objectives is necessary for the Company to achieve its ultimate goal of becoming the best- operated energy company in North America.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We explain each of our performance targets and measures in detail in our CD&A, but a few examples of Company success in areas related to our targets and measures include the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Achieved 7.6% compound operating earnings per share growth from 2012-2016 (see discussion of operating earnings on page 44).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Increased our dividend payment to an annualized rate of $3.08 per share in 2016, representing a 5.5% increase over the annualized dividend rate in 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Achieved outstanding safety results including finishing in the top decile of companies completing the National Safety Council barometer survey and earning the lowest OSHA injury recordable rate in Company history for the second straight year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Achieved top quartile customer satisfaction for both electric and gas residential customers in latest J.D. Power studies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Received Gallup Great Workplace Award for the fourth consecutive year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Competed $1.3 billion acquisition for Gas Storage & Pipelines business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of these accomplishments is related to a specific performance goal in our short- or long-term compensation programs, which in turn support the Companys aspiration of becoming the best-operated energy company in North America.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Organization and Compensation Committee (O&C Committee) employs the highest standards of corporate governance when implementing and reviewing our executive compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These high standards are evidenced in part by the O&C Committees and Boards 2015 adoption of amendments to the Executive Performance Plan to cap individual officer awards and amending the Long-Term Incentive Plan to eliminate single-trigger vesting upon certain changes in control of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Both of these changes were responsive to shareholder feedback and in keeping with industry standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The O&C Committee ensures independence of committee members and compensation consultants, avoids conflicts of interest and has enhanced shareholder disclosure in accordance with SEC and NYSE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For these reasons, the Board recommends that shareholders vote in favor of the following resolution:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED, that the shareholders approve, on an advisory basis, the overall executive compensation paid to the Named Executive Officers of the Company, as described in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis and the tabular and narrative disclosure regarding Named Executive Officer compensation contained in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because this vote is advisory, it will not be binding upon the Company or the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The O&C Committee will take into account the outcome of the vote when considering future executive compensation arrangements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS RECOMMENDS A VOTE FOR THIS PROPOSAL.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal No. 4  Advisory Proposal  Frequency of Advisory Votes to Approve Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Dodd-Frank Act requires the Company, at least once every six years, to provide shareholders with an opportunity to vote to advise the Board of Directors as to how often you wish the Company to include an advisory vote on executive compensation, similar to Proposal No. 3, in our proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors recommends that you vote to hold an advisory vote on executive compensation every year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We disclose our executive compensation to shareholders every year in our proxy statementtherefore an annual advisory vote can provide timely feedback to our Organization and Compensation Committee, which is responsible for designing our compensation structures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For these reasons, the Board of Directors recommends that you vote for the every year option on the following propos
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED, that the shareholders advise the Company to include an advisory vote on the compensation of the Companys Named Executive Officers:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: every year;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: every two years; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: every three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This vote is advisory, and will not be binding upon the Company or the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the advisory nature of the vote, the Board of Directors intends to adopt the shareholder-advised frequency for future advisory votes on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS RECOMMENDS A VOTE FOR EVERY YEAR ON THIS PROPOSAL.

sentences.text: Compensation Discussion and Analysis
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company believes in executive compensation that is competitive with our peers, has a meaningful performance component and has equity-based elements to encourage executives to maintain an appropriate ownership interest in the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our performance-based compensation programs result in a majority of the compensation of our Named Executive Officers (as identified below) being linked to the achievement of a combination of short-term and long-term Company and personal goals and shareholder value creation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following elements comprise the total compensation awarded to our Named Executive Officers (NEOs):
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Elements of Compensation   How this Element Serves the Companys Objectives Base Salary   Provides a stable, fixed source of income that reflects an executives job responsibilities, experience, value to the Company and demonstrated performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We target median base salaries for our peer group, taking into account differences in company size within the peer group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Incentive Awards   Intended to compensate individuals yearly based on the achievement of specific near- term, annual goals, which are established at the beginning of each year and approved by the O&C Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board and management have identified several priority areas that management and the Board discuss regularly when reviewing Company performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our performance measures for annual incentive awards are the measurements that the Board uses to track progress in these key priority areas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Achievement of these performance objectives is a critical measure of the Companys progress towards its goal of becoming the best- operated energy company in North America.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long-term Incentive Awards   Used to align executive actions with long-term management and shareholder objectives, providing rewards consistent with the creation of shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our plan is designed to help retain executives over time and ensure they have a strong sense of ownership in the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pay for Performance Alignment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys compensation programs are designed to clearly align performance objectives for our named executive officers with the interests of shareholders and with managements system of priorities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (See image of system of priorities on page 1.)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Companys aspiration is to be the best-operated energy company in North America and a force for growth and prosperity in the communities where we live and serve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We follow a system of priorities to achieve this objective, and our performance measures are designed to help move our Company towards achieving these priorities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following able demonstrates how many of our annual and long-term performance measures map to our system of priorities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our System of Priorities   Related Annual or Long-Term Performance Metrics Highly Engaged Employees     DTE Energy Employee Engagement - Gallup DTE Energy OSHA Recordable Incident Rate DTE Energy OSHA Days Away, Restricted and Transfer Rate Top-Decile Customer Satisfaction   Customer Satisfaction Index Customer Satisfaction Improvement Program Index MPSC Customer Complaints Distinctive Continuous Improvement Capability   Customer Satisfaction Improvement Program Index Utility Operating Excellence Index Strong Political & Regulatory Context   Customer Satisfaction Improvement Program Index Utility Operating Excellence Index MPSC Customer Complaints Clear Growth & Value Creation Strategy   DTE Energy Total Shareholder Return vs Peer Group Superior & Sustainable Financial Performance     DTE Energy Cash Flow DTE Energy Operating Earnings Per Share DTE Energy Ratio of Funds From Operations to Debt
