sentences.text: Other than the Change-In-Control Severance Agreements discussed below, we have not entered into any other severance agreements or other arrangements with the Named Executive Officers and do not maintain any other severance benefit programs for the Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change-in-Control Benefits
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have entered into Change-In-Control Severance Agreements with certain executives, including the Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The agreements are intended to provide continuity of management in the event there is a change in control of the Company and to align executive and shareholder interests in support of corporate transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of these agreements, a change in control occurs if
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) we or our assets are acquired by another company or if we merge, consolidate, or reorganize with another company and less than 55% of the new or acquiring companys combined voting stock is held by holders of the voting stock of the Company immediately prior to the change-in-control transaction,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) a person becomes the beneficial owner of at least 20% of the Companys voting stock,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) a majority of the Companys Board members change within a period of two consecutive years,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) the Companys shareholders approve a complete liquidation or dissolution of the Company, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) the Company executes, at the direction of the Board, one or more definitive agreements to engage in a transaction that will result in one of the events described in
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) through
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Change-In-Control Severance Agreements provide for severance compensation in the event that the executives employment is terminated (actually or constructively) within two years after a change in control of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The severance compensation provided to an executive following a qualifying termination is the same for all of the change-in- control events.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The cash severance benefit is the sum of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) a multiple of the executives base salary plus annual bonus, assuming target performance goals for such year would be met, plus
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) a lump sum payment of the executives pro-rated annual bonus (reduced by any pro-rated annual bonus otherwise paid because of the executives termination).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The multiple for the Named Executive Officers is 200%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An additional amount is paid as consideration for the prohibition against engaging in any competitive activity for one year after termination that is imposed by the Change-In-Control Severance Agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The additional amount for the Named Executive Officers is 100% of the executives base salary plus annual bonus, assuming target performance goals for such year would be met.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Change-In-Control Severance Agreement does not provide any gross-up payments for the purposes of payment of excise taxes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys retiree health and life insurance plans separately provide that any non-represented employee who receives severance pay because of a change in control will be credited with additional years of service after age 45 for
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: purposes of eligibility for retiree health and life insurance equal to individuals benefit continuation period under the applicable severance agreement or program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under these provisions, the Named Executive Officers would be
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: credited with an additional two years of service after age 45 for purposes of eligibility for retiree health and life insurance benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The severance payment includes payment by the Company for outplacement services by a firm selected by the Named Executive Officer in an amount up to 15% of the Named Executive Officers base pay.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the executive would receive an additional two years of age and service credits for purposes of the MSBP (if the executive is a participant in the MSBP, as are Messrs. Anderson, Oleksiak and Meador), or an additional two years of compensation credits for purposes of the ESRP, a cash payment representing health care and other welfare benefits for two years, and outplacement services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the executive is subject to the Companys mandatory retirement policy (as are the Named Executive Officers), the benefits provided under a Change-In-Control Severance Agreements are subject to reduction depending on the executives age at termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executives who have Change-In-Control Severance Agreements and are participants in the MSBP who meet certain age and service requirements at the time of their termination would receive an immediate distribution of their benefit under the MSBP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Long-Term Incentive Plan provides that all options, restricted stock awards and performance shares will become exercisable or vested or will be earned (as applicable) upon the occurrence of a change-in-control event (iv) described above or upon the occurrence of a change-in-control event (i) described above if the new or acquiring entity fails to replace or continue the awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance shares will be based on the greater of target performance or actual performance through the change-in-control date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a change-in-control event (i) described above occurs and the new or acquiring entity replaces or continues the awards, all options, restricted stock awards and performance shares will become exercisable or vested or will be earned (as applicable) as of the earlier of the date specified in the award agreement or the executives qualifying termination, which generally must occur within two years after the change-in-control date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have an irrevocable trust established to provide a source of funds to assist us in meeting our obligations under the Change-In-Control Severance Agreements and certain other director and executive compensation plans described previously.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We may make contributions to the trust from time to time in amounts determined sufficient to pay benefits when due to participants under such plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the trust, these plans are not qualified or fully funded, and amounts on deposit in the trust are subject to the claims of the Companys general creditors.

sentences.text: Proposal No. 5  Shareholder Proposal  Assessment of Public Policies and Technological Advances Consistent with Two Degree Global Warming Limit
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company expects the following shareholder proposal to be presented for consideration at the annual meeting which was co-filed by
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the Office of the Comptroller of State of New York, as custodian and trustee of the New York State Common Retirement Fund (the New York State Fund) and the administrative head of the New York State and Local Retirement System,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) Everence Financial on behalf of the Praxis Value Index Fund and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) Mercy Investment Services, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The New York State Fund beneficially owned an aggregate of 459,220 shares of the Companys common stock as of November 18, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Praxis Value Index Fund beneficially owned 3,270 shares of the Companys common stock as of November 21, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mercy Investment Services, Inc. beneficially owned 1,452 shares of the companys common stock as of November 18, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proposal, along with the supporting statement, is included below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The New York State Funds request was submitted by Thomas P. DiNapoli, Comptroller of the State of New York, 59 Maiden Lane, New York, New York 10038 on behalf of the New York State Fund.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Praxis Value Index Funds co-filed proposal was submitted by Chris C. Meyer, Everence Financial, 1110 N. Main St, P.O. Box 483, Goshen, IN 46527.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mercy Investment Services, Inc.s co-filed proposal was submitted by Mary Minette, Mercy Investment Services, 2039 North Geyer Road, St. Louis, MO 63131.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following proposal and supporting statement were jointly submitted by the New York State Fund, Praxis Value Index Fund, and Mercy Investment Services, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder Proposal and Supporting Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whereas: In November 2016 the Paris Agreement entered into force and its goal of keeping global temperature rise well below 2 degrees Celsius will begin to shape national policy decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To meet this goal the International Energy Agency estimates that the global average carbon intensity of electricity production will need to drop by 90 percent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As long-term shareholders, we would like to understand how DTE Energy is planning for the risks and opportunities presented by global efforts to keep global temperatures within acceptable boundaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In June 2016, the credit rating agency Moodys indicated that they would begin to analyze carbon transition risk based on scenarios consistent with the Paris Agreement, and noted the high carbon risk exposure of the power sector.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rapid expansion of low carbon technologies including distributed solar, battery storage, grid modernization, energy efficiency and electric vehicles provide not only challenges for utility business models but also opportunities for growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Many large corporations are actively seeking to increase their use of renewable energy, providing a significant market opportunity for forward-thinking utilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The International Energy Agency and the International Council on Clean Transportation forecast that electrification of transport will play a critical role in achieving the necessary greenhouse gas reductions by 2050.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DTE Energy is the 17th largest CO2 emitter in the U.S. and relies on coal for more than 70% of its power generation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DTE does not provide information on its long-term strategy or plan to decarbonize in ways that are consistent with the Paris Climate Agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As investors, we are concerned that DTE is not properly accounting for the risk of its current high reliance on carbon-intensive generation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A 2 degree scenario analysis of our companys current generation and future plans will generate a more complete picture of current and future risks and opportunities than business as usual planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By assessing the impact of a 2 degree scenario on the companys full portfolio of power generation assets and planned capital expenditures through 2040, including the financial risks associated with such scenarios, the company can better plan for future regulatory, technological and market changes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Resolved: Shareholders request that DTE Energy, with board oversight, publish an assessment (at reasonable cost and omitting proprietary information) of the long term impacts on the companys portfolio, of public policies and technological advances that are consistent with limiting global warming to no more than two degrees Celsius over pre-industrial levels.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Supporting Statement:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This report could include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How DTE Energy could adjust its capital expenditure plans to align with a two degree scenario; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Plans to integrate technological, regulatory and business model innovations such as electric vehicle infrastructure, distributed energy sources (storage and generation), demand response, smart grid technologies, and customer energy efficiency as well as corresponding revenue models and rate designs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors Response
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OPPOSES THIS SHAREHOLDER PROPOSAL AND RECOMMENDS A VOTE AGAINST IT FOR THE REASONS SET FORTH BELOW:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company takes its responsibility for environmental stewardship seriously and provides extensive public disclosure about its environmental, social and governance sustainability performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As described below, we continuously analyze and disclose risks and opportunities related to environmental policy and technological changes that are reasonably foreseeable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fact, we are in the process of transforming our generation fleet to make it environmentally cleaner, ncluding significantly reducing carbon emissions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not view the intended emission reduction goals of this proposal as additive to those efforts we already have underway.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This shareholder proposal, however, calls for an assessment of mpacts through 2040, and ties the assessment to the goals of the Paris Agreement, which has a scope far beyond the Companys ability to influence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because of the global nature of the climate issue such an assessment would be of questionable value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It would necessarily be based on speculation about developments over the next 24 years and would not provide useful information to investors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the view of the Board of Directors, preparing such an assessment would not be in the best interest of the Company and its shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company contacted the proponents to try to address their concerns, but the discussion did not lead to retraction of the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company prepares an annual Corporate Citizenship Report (CCR), which is publicly disclosed at dtecitizenship.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CCR contains detailed and robust disclosure of our environmental initiatives within the context of the utility industrys transformation to a lower-carbon future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our disclosure is compliant with the Global Reporting Initiative, a voluntary, nternational framework that provides guidance to organizations on non-financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2015-2016 CCR describes our plans over the next 15 years to shift our generation portfolio away from coal to a more balanced mix of coal, natural gas, nuclear and renewables resulting in significant carbon dioxide emission reductions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CCR sets forth our two-part goal to reduce carbon dioxide emissions from electric generation:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) a 20 percent reduction below 2010 levels by 2020, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) a 40 percent reduction below 2010 levels by 2030.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 2015 total emissions of carbon dioxide from electric generation were 17 percent below 2010 levels, indicating we are well on our way to achieving the 2020 goal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board and the Public Policy and Responsibility Committee (PPRC) oversee the Companys policies and practices in these areas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As outlined in its charter, the PPRC advises the Board on emerging social, economic, political, reputational and environmental issues that could significantly affect the Companys business and performance in relation to the community, shareholders, customers and employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The PPRCs responsibilities and duties include direct responsibility for climate change issues that affect the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The PPRC is composed of independent members of the Board, and it has the authority to retain independent outside professional advisors or experts as it deems advisable or necessary to carry out its duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As disclosed elsewhere in this proxy, the Company actively communicates with its shareholders about a broad range of topics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our shareholder engagement efforts have generated valuable feedback related to renewable energy and sustainability, and we will continue to seek input from our shareholders around these issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company also takes initiative in helping to craft public policy and legislation related to environmental sustainability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DTE Energy actively participated with the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), Michigans Agency for Energy, Michigans Department of Environmental Quality, the Edison Electric Institute and other business and community stakeholder groups to shape final carbon performance standards, including the Clean Power Plan issued by EPA in 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Despite the Supreme Courts stay of the Clean Power Plan in early 2016, DTE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Energy will continue to retire aging coal plants and replace these with cleaner natural gas and renewable energy over the next decade.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On June 8, 2016, the Company announced it would retire eight coal-fired energy generating units at three sites in Michigan within the next seven years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To offset the retirement of coal-fired generation, we have invested approximately $1 billion in renewable energy since 2008 and we have spurred an additional $1 billion in third-party renewable energy investment since 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We generated or contracted for about 3.6 million MWh of electricity from renewable energy sources in 2015, enough to power about 450,000 households.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By the end of 2015, DTE Energy met Michigans 10 percent renewable energy standard based on retail sales.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recently, DTE Energy led efforts to create new comprehensive legislation in Michigan which led to the December 2016 passage by the Michigan Legislature of an energy plan that includes a 15 percent renewable energy standard by 2021.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are well positioned to meet this targetDTE Energy is Michigans largest investor in renewable energy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have also carried out customer energy efficiency programs that have consistently exceeded targets, resulting in savings since 2009 of the equivalent carbon emissions from the annual energy use of almost 237,000 homes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As noted above, the Company is a proactive leader in reducing carbon emissions and in providing extensive disclosure about our plans to utilize available technologies to meet our environmental sustainability goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will continue to analyze trends in public policy and technological advances, and disclose to our stakeholders the impacts we can foresee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal, however, would lead to a duplicative and speculative assessment that would waste valuable Company resources without a corresponding benefit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS RECOMMENDS A VOTE AGAINST THE SHAREHOLDER PROPOSAL RELATING TO AN ASSESSMENT OF PUBLIC POLICIES AND TECHNOLOGICAL ADVANCES CONSISTENT WITH A TWO DEGREE GLOBAL WARMING LIMIT.

sentences.text: What is the difference between a Registered Shareholder and a Beneficial Shareholder?

sentences.text: A Registered Shareholder, also referred to as a shareholder of record, is a shareholder with shares registered in their name with Wells Fargo Bank, National Association, Shareowner Services Division, our transfer agent (Wells Fargo Shareowner Services).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Individuals who hold physical certificates and/or are participants in the DTE Energy Dividend Reinvestment and Stock Purchase Plan (DRIP), make up the largest portion of Registered Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Beneficial Shareholder, also referred to as a street name holder, is a shareholder with shares held in a stock brokerage account by a bank or other nominee.

sentences.text: To vote by mail, sign and date each proxy card (if you receive a paper copy) and return it in the enclosed prep envelope.

sentences.text: Note that if you vote more than once, your last vote counts and supersedes all others.

sentences.text: Your brokerage firm, bank or other nominee should have enclosed, or should have provided a Notice Card or Voting Instruction Form for you to direct them how to vote your shares.

sentences.text: If your DTE Energy shares are owned through the DTE Energy Company Savings & Stock Ownership Plan, the DTE Electric Company Savings & Stock Ownership Plan for Employees Represented by Local 223 of the Utility Workers Union of America, the DTE Electric Company Savings & Stock Ownership Plan for Employees Represented by Local 17 of the International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers or the DTE Gas Company Investment and Stock Ownership Plan (401(k) plans), see What shares are included on my proxy card or meeting notice?

sentences.text: below.

sentences.text: What shares are included on my proxy card or meeting notice?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered Shareholders - The proxy card or meeting notice you received covers all of the shares eligible to be voted in your account as of the Record Date regardless of type, including any shares held in certificated form or shares held in the DRIP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 401(k) plan Participants - The proxy card serves as a voting instruction to the Trustee for DTE Energy common stock owned by employees and retirees of DTE Energy and its affiliates in their respective 401(k) plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please note that if you are also a Registered Shareholder, shares held in the 401(k) plans will be listed separately and will be voted together with your registered shares on one proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial Shareholders - Separate voting instructions will be provided by each of your brokerage firms, banks or other nominees for shares held in street name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I change or revoke my vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a Registered Shareholder and/or own DTE Energy shares within the 401(k) plan, any subsequent vote or revocation received by the voting deadline will supersede your prior vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, if you voted by telephone, a subsequent Internet vote will change your vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deadlines for voting are indicated on the proxy card or meeting notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a Registered Shareholder and wish to change your vote using a new proxy card, please call 1-866-388-8558 to request a new proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered Shareholders may also change their vote on their registered shares by voting in person at the annual meetin
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to revoke any prior vote you must submit a letter addressed to our tabulator, Wells Fargo Shareowner Services, P.O. Box 64873, St. Paul, MN 55164-9397.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It must be received prior to the meeting to be processed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial Shareholders should contact their brokerage firm, bank or other nominee regarding the timing and method to change or revoke their vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Is my vote confidential?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes, your vote is confidential.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is received and counted by the tabulator and inspector of election, Wells Fargo Shareowner Services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote will not be disclosed except as required by law or in other limited circumstances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Will I receive an Annual Report?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DTE Energy no longer provides a separate Annual Report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys Form 10-K, filed with the SEC, is provided to Shareholders with the proxy materials and serves as our Annual Report to our Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What does it mean if I get more than one set of proxy materials or meeting notices?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to reducing mailing costs by providing meeting notices, we also try to reduce costs relating to mailing duplicate sets of proxy materials by a method called householding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See What is householding and how am I affected?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Despite these efforts, you may receive multiple copies of proxy materials if your shares are registered differently (i.e. trust, joint, name spelling variation, etc.) and/or if they are in more than one account (i.e., broker, bank, transfer agent, etc.).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please vote all of the proxies that you receive and consider consolidating your accounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a Registered Shareholder receiving multiple sets of materials and wish to consolidate accounts please contact Wells Fargo Shareowner Services at 1-866-388-8558.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a Beneficial Shareholder receiving multiple sets of materials and wish to consolidate accounts, please contact your brokerage firm, bank or other nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is householding and how am I affected?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For those Shareholders receiving paper copies of the Form 10-K and proxy statement, the SEC permits delivery of a single copy of these statements to Shareholders who have the same address and last name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This procedure, called householding, reduces the volume of duplicate information mailed and reduces printing and postage costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Despite householding of printed material, each Shareholder living at the same address will continue to receive a separate proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered Shareholders and DTE Energy 401(k) plan Participants: If you prefer to receive separate copies of our annual reports and proxy statements, now or in the future, please submit a written request to: Wells Fargo Shareowner Services, Attn: Householding/DTE Energy, P.O. Box 64854, St. Paul, MN 55164-0854.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Separate sets of documents will be promptly delivered to you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial Shareholders can request information about householding by contacting their brokerage firm, bank or other nominee of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I elect to receive or view DTE Energys annual report (Form 10-K) and proxy statement electronically?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a Registered Shareholder and you received printed proxy materials, you may elect to receive future proxy materials electronically.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To do so you must provide your consent and enroll in this service at investorelections.com/dte, where step-by-step instructions will prompt you through the enrollment process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By consenting to electronic delivery, you are stating that you currently have, and expect to have, access to the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I you do not currently have, or do not expect to have, access to the Internet, please do not elect to have documents delivered electronically.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have previously enrolled, you will receive an email notification directing you to the website where you can view, search and print the annual report and proxy materials and vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If this is your first time registering for electronic delivery, your enrollment will be effective for the 2018 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial Shareholders should contact their brokerage firm, bank or other nominee and inquire about their electronic delivery options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All DTE Energy Shareholders can view, search and print the current years proxy statement and Form 10-K at proxydocs.com/dte.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What constitutes a quorum?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There were 179,388,288 shares of our common stock outstanding on the Record Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share is entitled to one vote with respect to each matter coming before the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A majority of these outstanding shares present or represented by proxy at the meeting constitutes a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A quorum is necessary to conduct an annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What are abstentions and broker non-votes and how do they affect voting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions - If you specify on your proxy card that you wish to abstain from voting on an item, your shares will not be voted on that particular item.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions are counted toward establishing a quorum, but not toward determining the outcome of the proposal to which the abstention applies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker Non-Votes - Under New York Stock Exchange rules, if your broker holds your shares in its name and does not receive voting instructions from you, your broker has discretion to vote these shares on certain routine matters, including the ratification of the appointment of the independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting to elect directors in an uncontested election, to approve executive compensation, to approve the frequency of advisory votes on executive compensation, and to consider any shareholder proposals are all non-routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consequently, your broker must receive voting instructions from you in order to vote with respect to proposals 1, 3, 4 and 5 at our 2017 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On routine matters, including proposal 2, shares voted by brokers without instructions are counted toward the outcome.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How does the voting work?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each item, voting works as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal No. 1Election of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The election of each director requires approval by a majority of the votes cast, i.e., each of the twelve nominees for director must receive more than fifty percent of the votes cast at the meeting to be elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may withhold votes from one or more directors by writing their names in the space provided for that purpose on your proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Withhold votes are counted as votes cast and treated as votes against the relevant director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Failure to vote and broker non-votes will not be considered as votes cast for the election of directors and will not be counted either for or against each director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote by telephone or the Internet, follow the instructions attached to the proxy card or meeting notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your broker is not entitled to vote your shares on this matter unless instructions are received from you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You cannot vote for more than twelve directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal No. 2Ratification of Appointment of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ratification of the appointment of an independent registered public accounting firm requires approval by a majority of the votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions are not considered votes cast and will not be counted either for or against this matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your broker is entitled to vote your shares on this matter if no instructions are received from you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal No. 3Nonbinding Vote to Approve Executive Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of the Management Proposal requires approval from a majority of the votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your broker is not entitled to vote your shares unless instructions are received from you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions are not considered votes cast and will not be counted as either votes for or against this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal No. 4Frequency of Advisory Votes to Approve Executive Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of the frequency of advisory votes to approve executive compensation will be determined by a plurality of the votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, whichever of the three options receives the most votes will be considered the frequency approved by our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your broker is not entitled to vote your shares unless instructions are received from you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions are not considered votes cast and will not be counted in determining the plurality.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal No. 5Shareholder ProposalAssessment of Public Policies and Technological Advances Consistent with Two Degree Global Warming Limit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of the Shareholder Proposal requires approval from a majority of the votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your broker is not entitled to vote your shares unless instructions are received from you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are not considered votes cast and will not be counted either for or against this matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I attend the annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Shareholders as of the Record Date, or their duly appointed proxies, may attend the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You must pre- register in order to attend.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please contact DTE Energy Shareholder Services by email at shareowner@dteenergy.com or by telephone at (313) 235-4200 and provide your name, address, telephone number with area code, and note that you plan to attend the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DTE Energy will independently verify the status of Registered Shareholders as of the Record Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial Shareholders must provide evidence of share ownership to DTE Energy Shareholder Services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial ShareholdersBeneficial Shareholders must contact their brokerage firm, bank or other nominee and obtain a legal proxy in order to attend the meeting and vote their shares in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally, there will be a box that you can check on the voting instruction card or website to indicate that you wish to attend and vote your shares at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You must provide a copy of the legal proxy to DTE Energy Shareholder Services as definitive proof of ownership as of the Record Date in order to attend the meeting and to vote your shares in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a Beneficial Shareholder does not obtain a legal proxy but still wants to attend the annual meeting (and not vote their shares in person), you may provide other evidentiary material, such as broker statements, trade advices or a letter from your broker proving ownership as of the Record Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DTE Energy reserves the right to restrict admission if evidentiary material is not definitive proof of proper and timely ownership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DTE Energy will respond to all pre-registration requests and will maintain a list of verified Shareholders at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To gain admission at the meeting, you must present government-issued photo identification that matches the name on the pre-registration list.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual meeting pre-registration requests must be received by the end of business on Thursday, April 27, 2017.

sentences.text: Seating is limited and admission is on a first-come basis.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How will the annual meeting be conducted?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman of the Board (Chairman), or such other director as designated by the Board, will call the annual meeting to order, preside at the meeting and determine the order of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How does a shareholder recommend a person for election to the Board for the 2018 annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recommendations for nominations by shareholders should be in writing and addressed to our Corporate Secretary at our principal business address.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See the Shareholder Proposals and Nominations of Directors section of this Proxy Statement on page 74 for further information on submitting nominations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Once the Corporate Secretary properly receives a recommendation for nomination, the recommendation is sent to the Corporate Governance Committee for consideration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Candidates for directors nominated by shareholders will be given the same consideration as candidates nominated by other sources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Bylaws provide that the annual meeting of shareholders will be held on such date and at such time and place as may be fixed by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For Inclusion In Proxy Statement.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Detroit time on November 20, 2017.

sentences.text: For Matters to be Brought at the Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be timely, a shareholders notice nominating a person for election to the Board or proposing other business must be received not earlier than the 150th day and not later than the close of business on the 120th day prior to the anniversary of the most recent annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Procedures for Submitting Proposals and Nominations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any shareholder who wishes to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) nominate a person for election to the Board, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) propose other items of business at an annual meeting must be a shareholder of record at the time of giving the notice and entitled to vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All notices must be received by the Corporate Secretary, One Energy Plaza, Room 2386 WCB, Detroit, Michigan 48226-1279, fax: 313-235-8871.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any such notice must include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the name and address, as they appear on our books, of the shareholder making the proposal or nomination and of the beneficial owner, if any, on whose behalf the proposal or nomination is made;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: or nomination and by the beneficial owner, if any, on whose behalf the proposal or nomination is made; and  a representation that the person giving the notice is a shareholder of record entitled to vote at the annual meeting and intends to appear at the meeting in person or by proxy to make the nomination or propose the business specified in the notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our Bylaws require the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a shareholder notice is nominating a person (a Shareholder Nominee) for election to the Board, the notice must also include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the information that would be required to be disclosed in a proxy statement to comply with all applicable requirements of the Act and the rules and regulations thereunder as if each Shareholder Nominee had been nominated by the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: any additional information as necessary to permit the Board of Directors to determine if the Shareholder Nominee is independent under applicable listing standards, any applicable rules of the SEC and any publicly disclosed standards used by the Board in determining and disclosing the independence of the Companys directors;  written representation and agreement of the Shareholder Nominee, in the form provided by the Secretary upon
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: written representation and agreement of the Shareholder Nominee, in the form provided by the Secretary upon written request, relating to the Shareholder Nominees compliance, in his or her individual capacity and on behalf of any person or entity on whose behalf the nomination is being made, if elected as a director, with the Companys corporate governance, conflict of interest, confidentiality and stock ownership and trading policies and guidelines, any other Company code of conduct, policies and guidelines or any rules, regulations and listing standards, in each case as applicable to Company directors; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a written representation and agreement of the Shareholder Nominee, that such person
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) is not and will not become a party to any agreement or understanding with, and has not given any commitment or assurance to, any person or entity as to how such person, if elected as a director of the Company, will act or vote on any issue or question, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) is not and will not become a party to any agreement, arrangement or understanding with any person or entity other than the Company with respect to any direct or indirect compensation, reimbursement or indemnification in connection with service or action as director unless the terms of such agreement, arrangement or understanding have been provided to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any shareholder notice to nominate a Shareholder Nominee must be accompanied by a written and signed consent of the Shareholder Nominee to serve as a director of the Company if elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a shareholder notice is proposing any other items of business, the notice must also include as to each matter the shareholder proposes to bring before the annual meeting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a description in reasonable detail of the business desired to be brought before the annual meeting and the reasons for conducting such business at the annual meeting; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: any material interest the shareholder or the beneficial owner, if any, on whose behalf the proposal is made, has in the matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A shareholder must also comply with all the applicable requirements of the Exchange Act for shareholder proposals, including matters covered by SEC Rule 14a-8.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nothing in our Bylaws affects any rights of shareholders to request inclusion of proposals in the proxy statement pursuant to SEC Rule 14a-8.

sentences.text: By signing on the other side, I (we) appoint Bruce D. Peterson, Lisa A. Muschong and David E. Meador, any or all of them, as proxies to vote my our) shares of Common Stock of DTE Energy Company at the Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held on Thursday, May 4, 2017, and at al djournments thereof, upon the matters set forth on the reverse side hereof and upon such other matters as may properly come before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you sign and return this proxy, the shares will be voted as directed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If no direction is indicated, the shares will be voted FOR Proposals 1, 2, and 3, for the EVERY YEAR option for Proposal 4, and AGAINST Proposal 5.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your telephone or Internet vote authorizes the named proxies to vote your shares as directed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless you have voted by telephone or Internet, or have returned a signed proxy, the shares cannot be voted for you (except that your broker can vote your shares on Proposal 2 without your instruction).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered shareholder, you can also vote your shares at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For participants in one of the DTE Energy Company Savings Plans, by signing on the other side, you hereby direct Great-West Trust Company, LLC , as Trustee, to vote all shares of Common Stock of DTE Energy Company represented by your proportionate interest in the Trust at the Annual Meeting of Shareholders of the Company to be held on Thursday, May 4, 2017, and at all adjournments thereof, upon the matters set forth on the reverse side hereof and upon such other matters as may properly come before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Trustee is directed to vote as specified on the reverse.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you sign and return this form, but do not otherwise specify, the Trustee will vote FOR Proposals 1, 2, and 3, for the EVERY YEAR option for Proposal 4, and AGAINST Proposal 5.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only the Trustee can vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your shares cannot be voted in person.
